channel.title: Latest World News Headlines | Daily Telegraph

item.title: Teen violence: Gilbert PD releases new reports

description.#cdata-section: We're learning more about teen violence in the East Valley as Gilbert Police released new documents in the case of an attack at an In-N-Out.

item.title: Detroit man fatally shot in 2015, family still searching for answers

description.#cdata-section: 69-year-old Robert Ellis was found shot and burned in 2015 in his own rental property on Detroit's west side.

item.title: Attempted kidnapping suspect arrested in Glendale

description.#cdata-section: Glendale Police officers responded to the area of 43rd and Peoria avenues on the morning of Jan. 26 after the girl made a report "that an unknown adult male had attempted to grab her as she walked to school."

item.title: Phoenix Police release video of unsolved assault case

description.#cdata-section: Phoenix Police released new video on Jan. 27 of a suspect from an aggravated assault that happened back in December. FOX 10's Danielle Miller spoke with Phoenix Police about the crime.

item.title: Mesa neighborhood celebrates long-time male carrier’s retirement

description.#cdata-section: Saturday, Jan. 27 marked the end of an era for one Mesa community. Its mailman is retiring after serving their neighborhood for 10 years and serving the postal service for 51 years. FOX 10's Irene Snyder has more on how the community is paying tribute to one of their own.

item.title: ‘How dare he’: Biden unleashes on Trump in emotional speech

description.#cdata-section:
United States President Joe Biden has delivered an impassioned speech blasting Donald Trump as a “loser”.

The president took aim at his political rival while campaigning in South Carolina ahead of next week's Democratic Presidential primary.

Biden holds an enormous polling lead among Democrat candidates and is considered likely to represent his party at this year's election.

“Donald Trump, when he was commander in chief, refused to visit … a US cemetery outside of Paris for fallen American soldiers,” the President said. 

“And referred to those heroes and I quote as 'suckers and losers', he actually said that – how dare he say that.”

item.title: Dog’s deep impact on neighbors brings community together

description.#cdata-section: A beloved Delaware County dog sadly passed away and his impact on the community was felt so strongly by so many neighbors, they gathered to grieve with the owners.

Everyone around town is getting ready for the big game tomorrow -- including us! Local artist Jason Garcia is working on painting this Lions-themed mural in our newsroom. He's been working on it since Wednesday and expects to have it finished in time for the big game against the 49ers on Sunday.

item.title: Suspect killed in Phoenix Police shooting, department says

description.#cdata-section: Phoenix Police say a man was shot and killed by officers Saturday afternoon after he and a woman allegedly stole guns from a pawn shop.
